message: I ganked this question from @schrodingercat off Twitter yesterday. When you type, which thumb do you use on the space bar? Left, right or both (depending on what you're typing)? Also, indicate which hand you write with.  I exclusively use my right thumb for the space bar, and I'm right handed. You?
I'm right handed and use my right thumb too
I'm right handed but I never paid attention to which thumb I used until now.  It looks like I tend to use my right thumb for the space bar..

Like @herbg, I never really paid attention until @schrodingercat asked...I'm right-handed and use my left thumb on the spacebar for the most part (at least on my ergonomic keyboard). I don't remember what I do when I'm using my laptop while undocked...
I'm right handed, and I use my left thumb on the space bar...
Right handed, left thumb. And I type like a monkey

I'm right handed and almost always use the right thumb. There was another question I was curious about, which was: which  SHIFT key do you use the most? I don't think I've ever used the right SHIFT haha...
I'm probably 50/50 with the shift key.
WASD to move, spacebar to jump.
either.. kinda depends really.. i switch up a lot.. i guess it depends on what i was typing last.. but i do tend to favor my right
